text:
@narendramodi His name J.Anbalagan. He died 5 days ago due to #coronavirus.
Do you know who was he?
He was the FIRST MLA in INDIA died due to #COVID19. You don't have time to put a single tweet for his death but for an actor you could do.
MODI, YOU ARE SUCH A SHAME AND DISGRACE TO INDIA😠😠😠 https://t.co/KUcSpAuo5l
